course.title: Complete Java, Spring, and Microservices course

videos.title: Java Tutorial for Beginners 2023
videos.description: Comprehensive introduction to Java programming. Covers syntax, OOP concepts, data types, control structures, and basic Java applications.

videos.title: JUnit 5 Tutorial by Hyder Abbas
videos.description: Learn JUnit 5 for effective unit testing in Java. Covers test annotations, assertions, test lifecycle, and best practices for writing robust tests.

videos.title: Data Structures and Algorithms using Java
videos.description: Deep dive into essential data structures and algorithms implemented in Java. Covers arrays, linked lists, trees, sorting algorithms, and more.

videos.title: Git For Beginners 2023
videos.description: Master version control with Git. Learn about repositories, commits, branches, merging, and collaborating with remote repositories.

videos.title: Servlet & JSP Tutorial | Full Course
videos.description: Comprehensive guide to Java web development using Servlets and JavaServer Pages (JSP). Covers request handling, session management, and MVC pattern.

videos.title: Hibernate Tutorial | Full Course
videos.description: Learn Hibernate ORM for Java. Covers object-relational mapping, entity relationships, HQL, caching, and integration with Spring.

videos.title: Rest API | Web Service Tutorial
videos.description: Build RESTful web services in Java. Covers REST principles, HTTP methods, JSON parsing, authentication, and API documentation.

videos.title: Spring Framework and Microservices Full Course
videos.description: Comprehensive guide to Spring Framework and microservices architecture. Covers core Spring, Spring Boot, and building scalable microservices.

videos.title: Project Using Spring Boot MVC
videos.description: Hands-on project tutorial using Spring Boot and MVC pattern. Build a complete web application from scratch, including frontend and backend.

videos.title: Java Spring Boot Mongodb Full Project
videos.description: Build a full-stack application using Spring Boot and MongoDB. Covers NoSQL database integration, RESTful API development, and data modeling.

videos.title: Microservices Tutorial for Beginners
videos.description: Introduction to microservices architecture. Learn about service discovery, API gateway, load balancing, and containerization with Docker.
